ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Peace be upon you!' from the Companions of the Right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There will be the salutation by those of the right hand: "Peace on you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: he will be welcomed by the words: “Peace to you” from the People on the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: it will be with the people of the right hand, living in peace and security.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then upon you is the greetings of peace (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), from those on the right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then Salam (peace) to you from those on the right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then peace to you from those on the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Peace be upon thee, Companion of the Right!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then (the greeting) "Peace be unto thee" from those on the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: he will be greeted with, "Peace be to you," by those on the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then: peace Unto thee, for thou art of those on the right hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then [he will be told,] ‘Peace be on you, from the People of the Right Hand!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (For him is the salutation), "Peace be unto thee", from the Companions of the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then there is safety and peace (from the Punishment of Allah) for (you as you are from) those on the Right Hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (he will be greeted with): 'Peace be upon you, Companion of the Right'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then, “Peace upon you,” from those on the Right.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:91] then ‘Peace be to you’, that is, [then] for him there will be [peace by way of] security (salām) from   chastisement, [a greeting] from those of the right [hand], [arising] from the fact that he is one of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then (the greeting) "Peace be unto thee" from those on the right hand) then peace and safety to you from the people of the right hand; Allah has taken charge of their matter and saved them; it is also said this means: the people of Paradise greet you with the greeting of peace.
